stockmarket.controller

Interface Features

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualGambleControllerGUI

    public interface Features
    This class represents the features for the controller supporting GUI for the VirtualGamble application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection getData(java.lang.String requiredData)
      Method to get the data from the model to be displayed on the GUI.
      void processInput(java.lang.String choice, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> userInputs)
      Method to process the input from the user and call the corresponding method in the model.

    • Method Detail

      • startUp

        void startUp()
        Method to startUp the application.

      • processInput

        void processInput(java.lang.String choice,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> userInputs)
        Method to process the input from the user and call the corresponding method in the model.
        Parameters:
        choice - Option selected by user
        userInputs - A map that represents user input

      • getData

        java.util.Collection getData(java.lang.String requiredData)
        Method to get the data from the model to be displayed on the GUI.
        Parameters:
        requiredData - this is the name of required data to be fetched from model
        Returns:
        a collection of data fetched from model based on the requiredData parameter
